welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sayda, Syria! Known for its vibrant culture and historical charm, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Sayda."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at King Hussein Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at King Hussein Airport caters to high-profile and VIP passengers, providing exclusive services and amenities.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at King Hussein Airport handles all cargo and freight operations, including import and export.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
